name: Heart-shaped Lego Cocktail Ring
description:
Classic childhood building blocks have reached new heights with this "Roof Top" LEGO® ring.

This ultra-hip piece is a stylish accessory for women, men and children.

It's best worn while blogging, sipping wine, or accepting compliments. 

All rings are adjustable and available in over a dozen colors, just let me know what color you'd like and I'll let you know if it's available.

As a gift, I'll send extra LEGO® pieces so you can accessorize your ring! 

Contact me for party packs and wholesale prices.

Don't forget to "Like" The Family Jewels Accessories on Facebook
and watch our promo video at:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D-KHvKD9kUY&feature=mfu_in_order&list=UL

**LEGO® is a trademark of the LEGO Group of Companies which does not sponsor, authorize or endorse this product.**
